name: Youtube Channel Information
special_instructions: start_urls is a required field, it must be provided. If it is not provided return can_fulfill false and explain accordingly
details field allows to get the full video description, comment counts and view counts
dateFilter allows to select a date cutoff to collect only video more recent than this one. In any case, the most recent video is always returned for every channel

The output fields include channelId, channelShortName, channelName, channelDescription, channelThumbnailUrl, channelTotalVideos, numberOfSubscribers, channelTotalViews, channelJoinedDate, channelLocation, channelUrl, videos, id, title, url, text, thumbnailUrl, relativeDate, duration, viewCount, commentsCount, likes, date, location, subtitles, comments, fromYTUrl
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
